title: Add Alpha
description: Add alpha value to any color.

title: Theme (Dark & Light)
simpleCode: Set( THEME_MODE_ID, 1 ); ClearCollect( THEMING, { ID: 0, NAME: "DARK", VALUES: { BK_OVERLAY: RGBA( 255, 255, 255, 0.5 ), BK_SCREEN: RGBA( 72, 72, 82, 1 ), VALID: RGBA( 61, 133, 80, 1 ), INVALID: RGBA( 223, 73, 73, 1 ), PRIMARY: ColorValue("#e1242a"), PRIMARY_LIGHTER: ColorFade( ColorValue("#e1242a"), 20% ), TEXT_PRIMARY: RGBA( 255, 255, 255, 1 ), BK_CONTAINER: RGBA( 19, 19, 19, 1 ), BK_INPUT: RGBA( 32, 32, 32, 1 ), DISABLED_FILL: RGBA( 0, 0, 0, 0 ), DISABLED_COLOR: RGBA( 150, 150, 150, 1 ), BORDER_COLOR: RGBA( 42, 42, 42, 0.2 ), BK_LIGHTER: RGBA( 50, 50, 50, 1 ), BK_DARKER: RGBA( 15, 14, 20, 1 ), BK_CANVAS: RGBA( 12, 12, 12, 1 ), ICON: { SIZE_SMALL: 12, SIZE_DEFAULT: 16, SIZE_LARGE: 24, FILL: RGBA( 0, 0, 0, 0 ), HOVER_FILL: RGBA( 0, 0, 0, 0 ), COLOR: RGBA( 255, 255, 255, 1 ), HOVER_COLOR: ColorValue("#e1242a") }, BUTTON: { BORDER_SIZE: 0, FILL: RGBA( 12, 12, 12, 1 ), HOVER_FILL: ColorValue("#e1242a"), HOVER_COLOR: ColorValue("#FFFFFF"), FONT: {WEIGHT: FontWeight.Bold} }, LAYOUT: { SPACING_BASELINE: 8, BORDER_RADIUS: 12, BORDER_SIZE: 0, INPUT_HEIGHT: 42 }, FONT: { COLOR: RGBA( 255, 255, 255, 1 ), SECONDARY: RGBA( 255, 255, 255, 0.44 ), TYPE: "Bauhaus 93", SIZE_TITLE: 22, SIZE_DEFAULT: 14, SIZE_SMALL: 11, SIZE_TINY: 9, FONT_WEIGHT: { TITLE: FontWeight.Bold, DEFAULT: FontWeight.Normal, SMALL: FontWeight.Lighter, SELECTED: FontWeight.Bold } } } }, { ID: 1, NAME: "LIGHT", VALUES: { BK_OVERLAY: RGBA( 0, 0, 0, 0.5 ), BK_SCREEN: RGBA( 163, 163, 163, 1 ), VALID: RGBA( 61, 133, 80, 1 ), INVALID: RGBA( 223, 73, 73, 1 ), PRIMARY: ColorValue("#e1242a"), PRIMARY_LIGHTER: ColorFade( ColorValue("#e1242a"), 20% ), TEXT_PRIMARY: RGBA( 255, 255, 255, 1 ), BK_CONTAINER: RGBA( 240, 240, 240, 1 ), BK_INPUT: RGBA( 220, 220, 220, 1 ), DISABLED_FILL: RGBA( 0, 0, 0, 0 ), DISABLED_COLOR: RGBA( 150, 150, 150, 1 ), BORDER_COLOR: RGBA( 0, 0, 0, 0.05 ), BK_LIGHTER: RGBA( 250, 250, 250, 1 ), BK_DARKER: RGBA( 233, 233, 242, 1 ), BK_CANVAS: RGBA( 255, 255, 255, 1 ), ICON: { SIZE_SMALL: 12, SIZE_DEFAULT: 16, SIZE_LARGE: 24, FILL: RGBA( 0, 0, 0, 0 ), HOVER_FILL: RGBA( 0, 0, 0, 0 ), COLOR: RGBA( 0, 0, 0, 1 ), HOVER_COLOR: RGBA( 67, 59, 255, 1 ) }, BUTTON: { FILL: RGBA( 255, 255, 255, 1 ), BORDER_SIZE: 0, HOVER_FILL: ColorValue("#e1242a"), HOVER_COLOR: RGBA( 255, 255, 255, 1 ), FONT: {WEIGHT: FontWeight.Bold} }, LAYOUT: { SPACING_BASELINE: 8, BORDER_RADIUS: 13, BORDER_SIZE: 0, INPUT_HEIGHT: 42 }, FONT: { COLOR: RGBA( 0, 0, 0, 1 ), SECONDARY: RGBA( 0, 0, 0, 0.55 ), TYPE: "Bahnschrift", SIZE_TITLE: 24, SIZE_DEFAULT: 13, SIZE_SMALL: 10, SIZE_TINY: 8, FONT_WEIGHT: { TITLE: FontWeight.Bold, DEFAULT: FontWeight.Normal, SMALL: FontWeight.Lighter, SELECTED: FontWeight.Bold } } } } );

title: Overlay Blueprint.
description: Blueprint for a simple overlay. You need to add an animation component.

title: Hover Icon
description: Hover Icon Container. You need the hover PCF.
